description.brief: Orogen component/Rock wrapper for libviso2, library for visual odometry

package.description: Orogen component for libviso2, library for stereo/mono visual odometry and Structure-from-Motion pipeline (3d reconstruction) developed by Karlsruhe Institute of Technology.
package.author: Javier Hidalgo Carrio/javier.hidalgo_carrio@dfki.de
